title: ranked questions
body:
i have some questions about ranked game that i will realy appreciate if u answer it ^.^
1- when do u get to a lower division ( from b3 to b4 for an example ) is it when u lose a game when u r the last 1 on your league or when u lose 3+   games in a row while having 0 pts or when u lose ??
2- the number of points u get or lose  after a game , is it random? if not , then what does it depend on ??
thx

replies.body:
Hey man,

Give this a read it should answer the questions you have

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760-Ranked-Play-FAQ
If you are talking about placement matches then I think it depends on your sore after the game.I won 5 and I lost 5 but all my matches had a positive k/d/a in them and I still got silver 4.

>but all my matches had a positive k/d/a in them

This has no relevance to where you get placed at all.
